code.value:
from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import MessageTextInput, Output
from langflow.schema import Data
import requests

class TelegramSenderComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Telegram Bot Message"
    description = "Send messages via Telegram Bot API"
    icon = "message-square"
    name = "TelegramBotMessage"
    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="bot_token",
            display_name="Bot Token",
            info="Telegram Bot API Token",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="chat_id",
            display_name="Chat ID",
            info="Chat ID para enviar mensagem",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),

        MessageTextInput(
            name="message",
            display_name="Message",
            info="Message to send via Telegram",
            value="",
            tool_mode=True,
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [Output(display_name="Response", name="output", method="build_output")]

    def build_output(self) -> Data:
        url = f"https://api.telegram.org/bot{self.bot_token}/sendMessage"
        params = {
            "chat_id": self.chat_id,
            "text": self.message
        }
        try:
            response = requests.get(url, params=params)
            response.raise_for_status()
            result = response.json()
            data = Data(value=result)
        except Exception as e:
            data = Data(value=str(e))
        self.status = data
        return data
